data.system_settings: Lenovo 7373FGM, 1280 x 1024 Display, Windows 10 Pro Insider Preview x64 v10.0.17677 Build 17677, Firefox Quantum 60.0.1
data.actual_result: The captcha still appears after completion.
data.expected_result: The captcha should go away after you have successfully verified and the green tick should appear.
data.short_description: The captcha on firefox appears when loading and doesn't disappear until you click anywhere in the client.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open firefox and make sure you aren't signed into any accounts - Get an invite link and paste it in the URL bar - Type in a random name - Complete the captcha and don't click anywhere else apart from in the captcha - Observe
